CODE_DESCRIPTION: This p5.js sketch recursively draws nested rectangles with decreasing size and stroke brightness. Each frame clears the canvas to black and redraws the pattern, creating a static but visually recursive tunnel-like effect.
GENERATION_METHOD: Recursive rule-based drawing of rectangles with decreasing dimensions and color intensity
OUTPUT_DESCRIPTION: A series of nested, unfilled rectangles in varying shades of gray, centered on a black background, forming a tunnel-like recursive pattern.
